title: Rest in Peace Crash Bandicoot - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.30.21
description:
FUTURE DAD Greg is joined by Future Class Blessing to talk about Toys for Bob moving away from Crash Bandicoot and towards Call of Duty, Fall Guys Switch/Xbox delay, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:40 - Housekeeping
I’m gonna be a Dad! Gen’s coming on today’s Kinda Funny Podcast. Write-in or watch live or catch it over the weekend!
The next 2 Tuesdays at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone
In case you missed it: Apex Legends Legacy First Impressions, with Blessing and Andy is live right now. New mode, new season.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report  -
00:09:30 - RIP Crash Bandicoot?! Toys for Bob is dead as we Knew them
00:22:50 - Fall Guys Xbox, Switch Delayed -- But Cross Play Promised!
00:26:00 - Among Us Coming to PS5/4
00:30:50 - IO Working on a Dragon game for Xbox, Jez Cordon @ Windows Central
00:34:30 - There are ~8 RPGs in development at Xbox studios. Which one are you most excited for and ... is that.... too much? - Best Friends Q:Dhruvenator
00:40:18 - Ad
00:45:45 - Cyberpunk Sucks, but the Bonuses Don’t, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:52:50 - Outriders Patch Does a lot but not the Big Thing, Paul Tassi
00:54:20 - Fortnite Teases! Mark Delaney @ GameSpot
00:56:15 - Sony/Microsoft Almost Published Destiny, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:57:10 - Out today
00:58:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Greg and Whitta
Wednesday: Blessing and Tim
Thursday: Greg and Tim
Friday: Greg and Blessing

The next 2 Tuesdays at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone
